displayName.english: Mountains of Grain, Fields of Starvation

description.english: Collect all texts for 「Year of Abundance and Famine」

displayName.english: Delight in Punishment, and Perish by It

description.english: Collect all texts for 「Rule of Blood」

displayName.english: Defile Blood with Blood, Ashore with Shores

description.english: Collect all texts for 「Blood and Shore」
Collect all texts for 「The Sought After」

name: 集齐万界旅人与三愚者

description.english: Collect all texts for 「Traveler of Worlds and Three Fools」
description.schinese: 集齐书籍《万界旅人与三愚者》
description.tchinese: 集齊書籍《萬界旅人與三愚者》

description.english: Collect all texts for 「Tales of Realms」

displayName.english: Thank you, I Will Embark on This Journey
displayName.schinese: 感谢你们，我将踏上旅程
displayName.tchinese: 感謝你們，我將踏上旅程

displayName.english: Rebuild the Wall, Protect the Priceless Things
displayName.schinese: 再筑垣墙，守护无价之物
displayName.tchinese: 再築垣牆，守護無價之物

displayName.english: Wishes Unite, Forming a Sea of Dawn Dew
displayName.schinese: 群聚之愿，凝成朝露之海
displayName.tchinese: 群聚之願，凝成朝露之海

displayName.english: Heart of Compassion, Smooth the Sharp Edges
displayName.schinese: 怜悯之心，治愈锐利缺痕
displayName.tchinese: 憐憫之心，撫平銳利缺痕

displayName.english: Unending Exploration, Grant Truth to the Future
displayName.schinese: 探究不息，予未来以真理
displayName.tchinese: 探究不息，予未來以真理

displayName.english: Strive Relentlessly, Unite All in One Realm
displayName.schinese: 勉力追寻，团结众方一境
displayName.tchinese: 勉力追尋，團結眾方一境

displayName.english: Echo the Wishes, Nurture the Nameless Flower
displayName.schinese: 聆取共愿，哺育无名之花
displayName.tchinese: 聆取共願，哺育無名之花

displayName.english: Awaken the Nature, Return the Fruits of Evil Deeds
displayName.schinese: 沉眠初醒，奉还恶行之果
displayName.tchinese: 沉眠初醒，奉還惡行之果

description.english: Defeat 「Immortal Fool - Frey」 and repel 「Compassion Fool - Ango」
description.schinese: 击败「不朽愚者-弗雷」(傀儡)，并击退「慈悲愚者-垵戈」
description.tchinese: 擊敗「不朽愚者-弗雷」，並擊退「慈悲愚者-垵戈」

description.english: Defeat「Bearer of the Flag of Madness」

name: 慈悲永驻之地探索度满

description.english: Reach 90% Exploration in 「Land of Everlasting Mercy」
description.schinese: 「慈悲永驻之地」的探索度达到90%
description.tchinese: 「慈悲永駐之地」的探索度達到90%

displayName.english: Full Tread「Path of the Deep Land」

description.english: Reach 90% Exploration in 「Path of the Deep Land」

displayName.english: Full Tread「Relics of the Li City」

description.english: Reach 90% Exploration in 「Relics of the Li City」

name: 真理探求之园探索度满

description.schinese: 「真理探求之园」的探索度达到90%
description.tchinese: 「真理探求之園」的探索度達到90%

name: 倒悬生灵之塔探索度满

description.english: Reach 90% Exploration in 「Tower of Inverted Souls」
description.schinese: 「倒悬生灵之塔」的探索度达到90%
description.tchinese: 「倒懸生靈之塔」的探索度達到90%

description.english: Commission the 「Engraver」 to craft Condense for the first time
description.schinese: 首次委托「雕楔师」制造凝刻
description.tchinese: 首次委託「雕楔師」製造凝刻

description.schinese: 为「兰」使用「唤生历芽之瓶」
description.tchinese: 為「蘭」使用「喚生曆芽之瓶」

description.schinese: 为「返岸」使用「唤生历芽之瓶」
description.tchinese: 為「返岸」使用「喚生曆芽之瓶」

description.schinese: 为「恩下」使用「唤生历芽之瓶」
description.tchinese: 為「恩下」使用「喚生曆芽之瓶」

description.english: Have 4 support units on the field simultaneously
description.schinese: 场上同时存在4个支援单位
description.tchinese: 場上同時存在4個支援單位

description.english: Enter at least 7 stances in a single turn
description.schinese: 单回合内，进入至少7次姿态
description.tchinese: 單回合內，進入至少7次姿態

description.english: Consume at least 100 MP in a single turn
description.schinese: 单回合内，消耗至少100凝结值
description.tchinese: 單回合內，消耗至少100凝結值

description.english: Consume at least 200 MP in a single turn
description.schinese: 单回合内，消耗至少200凝结值
description.tchinese: 單回合內，消耗至少200凝結值

description.english: Consume at least 300 MP in a single turn
description.schinese: 单回合内，消耗至少300凝结值
description.tchinese: 單回合內，消耗至少300凝結值

description.english: Consume at least 20 AP in a single turn
description.schinese: 单回合内，消耗至少20决意点
description.tchinese: 單回合內，消耗至少20決意點

description.english: Consume at least 30 AP in a single turn
description.schinese: 单回合内，消耗至少30决意点
description.tchinese: 單回合內，消耗至少30決意點

description.english: Consume at least 40 AP in a single turn
description.schinese: 单回合内，消耗至少40决意点
description.tchinese: 單回合內，消耗至少40決意點

description.english: Use at least 6 items in a single turn
description.schinese: 单回合内，使用至少6次道具
description.tchinese: 單回合內，使用至少6次道具

description.english: Use at least 12 items in a single turn
description.schinese: 单回合内，使用至少12次道具
description.tchinese: 單回合內，使用至少12次道具

description.english: Use at least 18 items in a single turn
description.schinese: 单回合内，使用至少18次道具
description.tchinese: 單回合內，使用至少18次道具

displayName.english: Gathering of Items Opens up the Way
A Dew born out of kindness

description.english: Obtain the Insight 「Reverse Heart of Extinction」
description.schinese: 获得心得「倒转坏灭之心」
description.tchinese: 獲得心得「倒轉壞滅之心」

description.english: Attempt to awaken the slumbering Dew in the startup screen
description.schinese: 尝试唤醒开始界面中沉睡的露
description.tchinese: 嘗試喚醒開始介面中沉睡的露

description.english: "Reach the end and greet the virtuous Dawn Dew. Thank you, 「Dew」."
description.schinese: 到达终点，迎来善良之朝露。 感谢你，「露」。
description.tchinese: "到達終點，迎來善良之朝露。 感謝你，「露」。"

displayName.english: Dawn Dew: Journey of the Realm
The creation song interwoven by nameless flowers
displayName.schinese: 无名之花交织的创世曲
displayName.tchinese: 無名之花交織的創世曲

description.english: Recalling all the laws of the Dawn Dew
